name: Flávio S. Corrêa da Silva
content: Home Flávio Soares Corrêa da Silva                   University of São Paulo (Brazil) PhD (1992) University of Edinburgh, livre docente (1999) USP faculty member - USP (since 1992), honorary research fellow - Univ. Aberdeen (since 2016) founder and head of LIDET - the Laboratory of Interactivity and Digital Entertainment member of the Research Center on Interactive Technologies director of the Research Center on Open Source Software member of LIAMF - the Laboratory of Logics, Artificial Intelligence and Formal Methods email: fcs at ime dot usp dot br, flaviosoares.correadasilva at abdn dot ac dot uk
